info.title: Egnyte
info.description: Egnyte is a service that keeps your files safe, synced, and easy to share. Connect to Egnyte to manage your files. You can perform various actions such as upload, update, get, and delete files in Egnyte.

get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a new file is created in a folder.

is_folder.description: Whether the resource is a folder (True or False).

userPrincipalName.title: User principal name
userPrincipalName.description: Do not specify if user is not AD authenticated.

path.description: The absolute path of the target file or folder.
path.title: Path

type.description: This determines what type of link will be created.
type.title: Type

accessibility.description: Determines who a link is accessible by.
accessibility.title: Accessibility (set "none" for upload links or links when "useDefaultSettings" is true)

useDefaultSettings.description: Determines whether to use the default parameters for link creation.
useDefaultSettings.title: Use Default Settings

sendEmail.description: If true is set, link will be sent via email by Egnyte.
sendEmail.title: Send email

recipients.description: List email addresses of recipients of the link. Only required if "Send email" is true.
recipients.title: Recipients

message.description: Personal message to be sent in link email.
message.title: Message (Only applies if "Send email" is true.)

copyMe.description: If true is set, a copy of the link message will be sent to the link creator.
copyMe.title: Copy me (Only applies if "Send email" is true)

notify.description: If true is set, link creator will be notified via email when link is accessed.
notify.title: Notify

linkToCurrent.description: If true is set, the link will always refer to current version of file.

expiryClicks.description: Number of clicks the link is valid for. If specified, "Expiry date" cannot be set
expiryClicks.title: Expiry clicks

addFileName.description: If true then the filename will be appended to the end of the link.
addFileName.title: Add a file name (Only applies to file links, not folder links)

password.title: Password (when "accessibility" parameter is set to "password")

protection.description: If set to "PREVIEW", it will create a preview-only link.
protection.title: Protection

folderPerRecipient.description: If true then each recipient's uploaded data will be put into a separate folder.
folderPerRecipient.title: Folder per recipient (Only applies to upload links.)
